executionDetails: Updated .github/prompts/rdd.07-update-docs.prompt.md to reference Python scripts (rdd.py and rdd_utils.py) instead of general bash script references. Modified S02 instruction to clarify that scripts are Python-based.

Implemented prompt management domain in Python: Added mark-completed, log-execution, list, and validate-status functions to rdd_utils.py (~220 lines). Added prompt domain routing to rdd.py (~80 lines). Tested all commands successfully. Created documentation in P02-implementation.md analyzing missing functionality and implementation details.

Updated rdd.08-wrap-up.prompt.md to use Python scripts (python3 .rdd/scripts/rdd.py). Implemented branch cleanup command in rdd.py (~180 lines): Added cleanup_after_merge function with interactive prompts, fetch/pull from main, and branch deletion. Added cleanup action to route_branch and updated show_branch_help. Tested all commands successfully. All wrap-up prompt commands now functional in Python.

Updated .github/prompts/rdd.G4-update-from-main.prompt.md to use Python scripts. Implemented missing git functions: stash_changes, restore_stashed_changes, pull_main, merge_main_into_current, and update_from_main in rdd_utils.py. Added update-from-main command to rdd.py. All functionality verified and tested.

Modified wrap-up workflow: added branch type validation (enh/fix), removed uncommitted changes check, changed commit message to 'wrap up <branch-name>', updated prompt file, added get_branch_type() and is_enh_or_fix_branch() functions to rdd_utils.py
